description.p: The thought of running free and wild has always been there with me and increased day by day, for which I am forever gratefull to everyone who influenced me from my childhood days and continue to do so till now! Whenever I come across the so called Nationalists or indivuals who hate chaos, I usually thought or I get this immediate feeling that I always wanted to be an anarchist!. Sometimes I actually confront myself with the fact that well I am an anarchist. Well the truth is I guess I don`t like other people or organizations to govern our thoughts or to give us the directions we need to go! I think we are quite capable in deciding what`s good for us and everyone around us.
